name: A SHORT DOOMED PLEASURE ALONG APOCALYPSE-CONTINUES
description:
The collectors of this Primary Sales will get the HQ of the video, hit me on Twitter @Loudsonic.
and only for Indonesian Collectors, also will be received the A2 Poster (exclude shipping fee, use J&T COD) 

The Apocalypse is a process, never ending process, not a calculation of an Alpha and Omega. The Apocalypse never had a reason to meet an end, just chill it doomed.  Because TETSUO want you more than dead, he will split your freaking head open..

  This is a tribute for TETSUO SHIMA written and illustrated (originally) by the almighty Katsuhiro Otomo 1982 work; AKIRA. Previously released as a rendition merch in April 2020 that sold for 100/100 bundle-pack. https://www.instagram.com/p/B-2UkN8n4m8/

Audio mix & messed-up by dotFM https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5dtIN9aZf4K4fnD5tz6vcw/videos
Illustration & animation by the one and only LOUDSONIC
